overview:
David is a Managing Director of BrandJourney Capital. He also serves as President of Journey 9, a direct marketing venture partnering with leading media and consumer businesses. Previously, David was President of First Resorts, a direct marketer of vacation packages in the United Kingdom and led its early development until 2003.

David co-founded The Vacation Store in 1994 and served as its President, growing the start-up into a leading national distributor of leisure travel until its sale in late 1998.

Previously, David was a Managing Director of Prime Strategy Consultants, a strategic consulting firm based in London, which he founded in 1990. David’s clients included leading British firms such as National Westminster Bank, British Airways and Cable & Wireless.

From 1987 to 1990, David worked for BDO Stoy Hayward, where he became a partner. David has a MBA from London Business School and a manufacturing engineering degree from University of Birmingham, England.
